name: Space Conquer (deadbrain.games)
description:
A 2D side scrolling run and gun game with infinite proceduraly generated level where your objective is to go as far as you can while shooting UFOs with a laser gun.

Master the environment and don't let them catch you to conquer space.

This is an open-source game which can be found a https://code.deadbrain.games/space-conquer.git

The game was made using free assets (mostly from other itch.io users):

  • art: Peony Space-Pixel Art
  • art: SpinachChicken
  • art: VECTORPIXELSTAR
  • art: kenney
  • font: SBH TTF SBH4B by Francisco Beltran
  • music: Crash Landing by DOS-88
  • sound fx: dklon by boom8
  • sound fx: jalastram
  • sound fx: GAMEBOY SFX PACK #1 by OmegaPixelArt
